Question: This person played one of a group of veteran ex-test pilots sent into space to repair an old Soviet satellite.
Hints: This person's real-life offspring Francesca played his daughter in the film.
This person co-wrote "Why Should I Care" with Linda Thompson and Carole Bayer Sager, which was recorded by Diana Krall.
This person also has contributed music to his films, either through performing, writing, or composing.
